name: Island Battle
description:
Island Battle

It is just a gameplay prototype from my upcoming Island Battle game. This preview is available in singleplayer only: player vs AI (what is totally noob). Finished game include new islands, more gamemodes like: CO-OP, more figures, adjust bomb time etc etc..

Game idea is just drop your enemy out of the Island, or kill him. There is 3 rounds, after last match, game will restarts to round 1 again. In this preview, there is no menu yet.

Controls

Left/right arrowMoveUp arrowJumpCtrlKick bomb

Hope you like it!
